title: President Rajapaksa declares Sri Lanka standard time
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by:Nalin Hewapathirana) President Mahinda Rajapaksa officially declared the standard time of Sri Lanka which can be obtained through the website www.sltime.org, the Department of Government Information announced today on 11 April.  The Standard time of Sri Lanka is to be announced at midnight today by the government, making…
